# Photo2ARW

## Installation

You can install the development version of Photo2ARW from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("nbelouard/Photo2ARW")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`photo2batchimport()`](https://nbelouard.github.io/Photo2ARW/reference/photo2batchimport.md)
  : Create the "batch import" table for Amphibian and Reptile Wildbook

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Prepare file for batch import into
  ARW](https://nbelouard.github.io/Photo2ARW/articles/intro.md):
